sentences.en: Since 1999, WildAid has helped the Russian government save the Siberian Tiger.
sentences.cn: “野生救援”从1999年开始帮助俄罗斯政府拯救西伯利亚虎。

sentences.en: Yao Ming, the famous professional basketball star is warmly welcomed by Eddie Wong, Director of Marketing of Renaissance Shanghai Pudong Hotel, for the launch of WildAid Shark Conservation PSA.
sentences.cn: 全球闻名的职业篮球明星姚明在参加“野生救援协会护鲨公益广告全球投放新闻发布会”时，受到了上海淳大万丽酒店市场总监黄凯迪的热忱欢迎。

trans.tran_cn: 世界野生动物救援协会
